name: Berserk
description: Cu Chulainn's Mana, MP5, and Mana Heals are instead applied to his Health pool. Abilities consume Rage, which stops regen at 25, but he gains Rage upon hitting with his Abilities as well as 1 Rage for Basic Attacks and .5 when he takes damage. After 3s above 85, he goes Berserk. While Berserk, Cu Chulainn gains Power and a Health Shield.
